class.name: AudioStreamSoundfontPlayer
class.brief_description: An audio stream that synthesizes sound from a SoundFont2, driven by direct note commands.
class.description: [AudioStreamSoundfontPlayer] is an [AudioStream] that acts as a live SoundFont2 instrument. Unlike [AudioStreamMIDI], it does not require a MIDI file - instead, notes are triggered programmatically through the [AudioStreamPlaybackSoundfont] playback instance. Assign a [member soundfont] resource, play via an [AudioStreamPlayer], then obtain the playback with [method AudioStreamPlayer.get_stream_playback] and call [method AudioStreamPlaybackSoundfont.note_on] / [method AudioStreamPlaybackSoundfont.note_off] to produce sound. This is ideal for virtual keyboards and interactive music applications.

members.member: The [SoundFont2] resource used to synthesize sound. Must be assigned before playback.
